# LeadMate - AI WhatsApp Customer Support Automation

## Product Overview
LeadMate is an AI-powered WhatsApp customer support automation platform designed specifically for small and medium-sized businesses. The platform transforms how businesses handle customer inquiries on WhatsApp by providing intelligent, automated responses while capturing valuable leads.

## Core Features
- **AI-Powered Responses**: Uses GPT-4 and advanced language models to provide natural, contextual responses to customer inquiries
- **Lead Capture**: Automatically detects and extracts customer information (name, phone, inquiry details) from conversations
- **Knowledge Base Integration**: Businesses can upload their FAQ, menu, or service information to train the AI
- **24/7 Availability**: Provides round-the-clock customer support without human intervention
- **WhatsApp Business API**: Direct integration with Twilio WhatsApp Business API
- **Real-time Dashboard**: Monitor conversations, leads, and usage analytics
- **Multi-tenant Architecture**: Secure, isolated data for each business
- **Lead Management**: Export leads to Google Sheets and receive email notifications

## Target Audience
- Small restaurants (menu-based ordering, reservations)
- Service businesses (gyms, salons, clinics with appointment booking)
- Local retailers (product inquiries, order processing)
- Consultants (lead qualification, appointment scheduling)
- Any small-medium business receiving customer inquiries via WhatsApp

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend & Backend**: Next.js 15 with TypeScript and App Router
- **Database**: Supabase (PostgreSQL with vector extensions for embeddings)
- **AI Services**: OpenAI GPT-4, text-embedding-3-small
- **Messaging**: Twilio WhatsApp Business API
- **Authentication**: Supabase Auth
- **Payments**: Stripe integration
- **Deployment**: Vercel
- **Analytics**: Vercel Analytics

## Key Benefits
- **10x Faster Setup**: Compared to building custom chatbot solutions
- **Cost-Effective**: Pay-per-use model affordable for small businesses
- **Compliance-First**: Adheres to WhatsApp business policies and data protection standards
- **Human-Centered**: AI enhances human connection rather than replacing it
- **Purpose-Built**: Specifically designed for customer support, not generic chatbots

## Use Cases

## Technical Implementation
- **RAG Pipeline**: Retrieval-Augmented Generation with vector similarity search
- **Lead Detection**: AI-native intent recognition without keyword rules
- **Multi-language**: Currently supports English with plans for expansion
- **Security**: Row Level Security (RLS), JWT authentication, webhook signature verification
- **Performance**: Sub-3-second response time critical for WhatsApp UX

## Compliance & Privacy
- **WhatsApp Policy Compliant**: Designed for legitimate customer support only
- **Data Protection**: Enterprise-grade security, never shares customer data
- **GDPR Ready**: Privacy-focused architecture with data retention controls
- **No Spam**: Strictly customer support focused, not mass messaging

## API Endpoints
- POST /api/webhook/whatsapp - Receive WhatsApp messages
- POST /api/knowledge - Upload and process business knowledge
- GET /api/conversations - Fetch chat history
- POST /api/chat/test - Test bot responses
- GET/POST /api/leads - Manage captured leads
- POST /api/integrations/google-sheets - Sync lead data
